role_description: An Ansible role that installs Normit (a translation tool) on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Normit](https://github.com/pawurb/normit) allows you to easily translate any text from one language to another. It also includes the ability to generate audio through speech synthesis as well.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Normit (a translation tool) on nearly any platform.
